data.name: RPG Maker MV - Heroes and Villains voices 【Japanese】vol.1
data.detailed_description:
Feel like adding a little authentic Japanese game-play language to your game? Stand out with this new Japanese language voice pack from Kadokawa! Featuring both male and female voiceovers spoken in Japanese, this pack has over 180 expressions covering many of the most important and common phrases your characters will need during their journeys.

Features:

* 29 Brave Male phrases
* 29 Warrior Male phrases
* 29 Swordsman Male phrases
* 29 Male Mage phrases
* 29 Brave Female phrases
* 21 Male Villain phrases
* 21 Female Villain phrases
* All files come in both High Res and Low res versions
* All phrases are spoken in Japanese
* .m4a and .ogg formats included
* For use with RPG Maker and Visual Novel games.

Tracklist viewable as screenshot (Japanese text only)
